fields.value: Replication data for: Pathophysiological responses of pine defensive metabolites largely lack differences between pine species but vary with eliciting ophiostomatoid fungal species

authorAffiliation.value: Department of Renewable Resources, University of Alberta

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Replication data for analyses described in "Pathophysiological responses of pine defensive metabolites largely lack differences between pine species but vary with eliciting ophiostomatoid fungal species" by Cale et al. (2019; Tree Physiology). 

Please see the Read Me file for specific details on dataset contents.

publicationCitation.value: Cale JA, Klutsch JG, Dykstra CB, Peters B, Erbilgin N. (2019). Pathophysiological responses of pine defensive metabolites largely lack differences between pine species but vary with eliciting ophiostomatoid fungal species. Tree Physiology. DOI: 10.1093/treephys/tpz012.

files.description: Reproduction data for reaction zone lengths and metabolite concentrations in reaction zone and phloem tissues of lodgepole and jack pine trees. See README for description of dataset variables.
